body_html:
PS, the workaround to avoid overwriting ./configure results on each rebase/pull:

git stash
git rebase origin/master
git stash pop
git checkout --theirs -- tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl

git stash
git rebase origin/master
git stash pop
git checkout --theirs -- tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
body:
PS, the workaround  to avoid overwriting ./configure results on each rebase/pull:

```
git stash
git rebase origin/master
git stash pop
git checkout --theirs -- tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl
```
